data.message:
For the past three days Facebook has been giving me errors when I upload videos to my page.
Then I messaged help center a couple of times  and every time I get
"Your feedback will be use to improve Facebook. Thanks for taking the time to make a report" 
 Can you tell what I can do  to fix it?

replies.message: Hi Shao. If you have reported this issue to our team, please sit tight while we take the time to review it. Rest assured that we are looking into all the reports that we receive. Thanks for your patience. -Jessica
